title: (x) tech-style simple sans - Faux CRA {Chester}
content:
Anyone Know this one? Please?  
thanx  
Gus

author: gngusmao

comments.content:
Aha! It's one of ours! Faux CRA Bold by Barry Deck, but but a stroke applied to make it bolder.  
 [http://vllg.com/Thirstype/FauxCRA/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102201057/http:/vllg.com/Thirstype/FauxCRA/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Thirstype/FauxCRA/mudTyper+Weights/")

Cool.
And the serif is almost a [Vendome](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102201057/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsnerflake/vendome_ot/?affid=99346).
Sorry, but the link doesn´t work. Where can I purchase this font?
It's no longer available. I would contact [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102201057/http:/vllg.com/) for more info.
